sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; const HomeComponentItem = ( { post = { "_id": 2001, "userName": "Novak Djokovic", "handle": "novak_djokovic", "handle2": "", "time": "50mins", "avater": "../../images/Novak_400x400.jpeg", "image": "../../images/2023_AO_men_final.avif", "title": "I'm very grateful for the kind of energy and reception and love and support I got last night.", "content1": "\"I'm super blessed and grateful...\" @DjokerNole paid tribute to the team behind his phenomenal success on the eve of another Grand Slam final.", "content2": "Led by our founders @DjokerNole and @jelenadjokovic, we have done great things in the past 15 years. We believe that these numbers will grow in the years ahead and that we will meet our goal of providing access to quality preschool education to every child in Serbia by 2030.❤️
https://novakdjokovic.com", "comments": "8976", "retweet": "1.2M", "liked": "68.7K", "isLiked": "true", "isSubscribed": "true" } } ) => { return (
{post.userName} @{post.handle} • {post.time}

{post.content1}

{`${post.handle2 != undefined ? {post.handle2} : ""}`}

{post.title}

{post.content2 == "" ? `` : `

${post.content2}

`}
    {post.comments}
    {post.retweet}
    {post.liked}


); }; export default HomeComponentItem;
